text: قال لا تخافا اننى معكما اسمع وارى

translations.translation: He said, 'Have no fear. I will be with you, All-Hearing and All-Seeing.
(The Lord) said: "Be not afraid. I am verily with you, and I hear and see.
He said: "Have no fear. I am with you, hearing and seeing all.
The Lord replied them, "Do not be afraid; I Am with you all the time, listening and seeing."
He said, “Do not fear – I am with you, All Hearing and All Seeing.”
He (Allah) said: "Fear not, verily, I am with you both, hearing and seeing."
He said: Fear not, surely I am with you both: I do hear and see.
Fear not,' said He. 'Surely I shall be with you, hearing and seeing.
He said: Fear not. Lo! I am with you twain, Hearing and Seeing.
God said, "Do not fear; I am with you both. I hear and I see.
He said; fear not; verily I shall be With you twain: I shall hear and see.
He said, ‘Do not be afraid, for I will be with the two of you, hearing and seeing [whatever happens].
He said: "Fear not: for I am with you: I hear and see (everything).
He (Allah) said: "Fear not, verily! I am with you both, hearing and seeing.
He replied: 'Have no fear I shall be with you, both hearing and seeing.
He said, “Do not fear, I am with you, I hear and I see.
[Allah] said, "Fear not. Indeed, I am with you both; I hear and I see.
[20:46] He said, ‘Do not fear, for I shall be with the two of you, by [providing you with] My assistance, hearing, what he says, and seeing, what he does.
(He said) Allah said to them: (Fear not) being beaten or killed. (Lo! I am with you twain) helping you, (Hearing) what you will be told (and Seeing) what he will do with you.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { قَالَ } سبحانه: { لاَ تَخَافَآ } من إفراطه وطغيانه { إِنَّنِي مَعَكُمَآ } عند أدائكما الرسالة { أَسْمَعُ } أقواله { وَأَرَىٰ } [طه: 46] أفعاله، فإذا أفرط عليكما أقدر على منعه وزجره

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: [المؤمنون: 51]، فإن هذا الخطاب قد حكى لنا بصيغة الجمع، مع أن كلا من المخاطبين لم يخاطب إلا بطريق الانفراد لاستحالة جمعهم في الوجود، فكيف باجتماعهم في الخطاب؟ { قال } تعالى لهما: { لا تخافا } ، وهو استئناف بياني، كأن قائلاً قال: فماذا قال لهما ربهما عند تضرعهما إليه؟ فقيل: قال: لا تخافا ما توهمتما من الأمرين، { إِنني معكما } بحفظي ورعايتي ونصري ومعونتي، { أسمعُ وأرى } ما يجري بينكما وبينه من قول وفعل، فأفعل في كل حال ما يليق بها من دفع ضر وشر، وجلب نفع وخير
